vote.title: Authorize the execution of an agreement (1) with Brad Oldham International, Inc. to accept the donation and installation of a polished stainless-steel owl sculpture (“Wise”), valued at $11,000.00, from artists, Brad Oldham and Christy Coltrin, in Exall Park located at 1355 Adair Street; and (2) with Friends of Exall Park to maintain the Wise sculpture - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize the execution of an agreement (1) with Brad Oldham International, Inc. to accept the donation and installation of a polished stainless-steel owl sculpture (“Wise”), valued at $11,000.00, from artists, Brad Oldham and Christy Coltrin, in Exall Park located at 1355 Adair Street; and (2) with Friends of Exall Park to maintain the Wise sculpture - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
